wikipedia_page.main: Aled Wyn Davies (born 3 August 1974) is a classical tenor from Llanbrynmair, in Powys, Mid Wales. He is a member of the Three Welsh Tenors with Rhys Meirion and Aled Hall.

response: * Aled Wyn Davies a classical tenor singer.

Aled Hall (Jones) is a Welsh classical tenor and opera artist from Pencader, Carmarthenshire, West Wales. He is currently a member of the Three Welsh Tenors with Rhys Meirion and Aled Wyn Davies.
